descriptions.cluster_health: Overall health status of all connected Kubernetes clusters.
descriptions.cluster_focus: Deep-dive view of a single cluster with key metrics and resources.
descriptions.cluster_network: Network connectivity and traffic flow between clusters.
descriptions.cluster_comparison: Side-by-side comparison of clusters by resource usage and health.
descriptions.cluster_costs: Estimated infrastructure costs broken down by cluster.
descriptions.cluster_metrics: Real-time CPU, memory, and pod metrics across clusters.
descriptions.cluster_locations: Geographic map of cluster locations worldwide.
descriptions.cluster_resource_tree: Hierarchical tree view of all resources in a cluster.
descriptions.app_status: Status of workloads across clusters with health indicators.
descriptions.workload_deployment: Deploy workloads to clusters using drag-and-drop.
descriptions.deployment_missions: Track multi-cluster deployment missions and their progress.
descriptions.deployment_progress: Real-time deployment rollout progress and status.
descriptions.deployment_status: Detailed status of deployments including replicas and conditions.
descriptions.deployment_issues: Active deployment problems such as failed rollouts or image pull errors.
descriptions.statefulset_status: Status of StatefulSets including replicas and volume claims.
descriptions.daemonset_status: Status of DaemonSets including node coverage and update progress.
descriptions.replicaset_status: Status of ReplicaSets including replica counts and conditions.
descriptions.job_status: Status of Jobs including completion, duration, and failures.
descriptions.cronjob_status: Status of CronJobs including schedules and recent runs.
descriptions.hpa_status: Status of Horizontal Pod Autoscalers and scaling metrics.
descriptions.cluster_groups: Organize clusters into logical groups for targeted deployments.
descriptions.resource_marshall: Explore resource dependency trees and ownership chains.
descriptions.workload_monitor: Monitor all resources for a workload with health status, alerts, and AI diagnose/repair.
descriptions.llmd_stack_monitor: Monitor the llm-d inference stack: model serving, EPP, gateways, and autoscalers.
descriptions.prow_ci_monitor: Monitor PROW CI jobs with success rates, failure analysis, and AI repair.
descriptions.github_ci_monitor: Monitor GitHub Actions workflows across repos with pass rates and alerts.
descriptions.cluster_health_monitor: Monitor cluster health across all connected clusters with pod and deployment issues.
descriptions.pod_issues: Pods with errors, restarts, or scheduling problems.
descriptions.top_pods: Top resource-consuming pods ranked by CPU or memory usage.
descriptions.resource_capacity: Cluster resource capacity vs. current allocation.
descriptions.resource_usage: CPU and memory allocation breakdown across clusters.
descriptions.node_status: Status of Kubernetes nodes including conditions and capacity.
descriptions.compute_overview: Summary of compute resources: nodes, CPUs, and memory.
descriptions.event_stream: Live stream of Kubernetes events from all clusters.
descriptions.event_summary: Aggregated event counts grouped by type and reason.
descriptions.warning_events: Warning-level events that may need attention.
descriptions.recent_events: Most recent events across all clusters.
descriptions.events_timeline: Timeline chart of event frequency over time.
descriptions.pod_health_trend: Historical trend of pod health status over time.
descriptions.resource_trend: Resource usage trends showing CPU and memory over time.
descriptions.storage_overview: Persistent volume and storage class overview.
descriptions.pvc_status: Status of Persistent Volume Claims across clusters.
descriptions.pv_status: Status of Persistent Volumes including capacity and binding.
descriptions.resource_quota_status: Resource quota utilization and limits across namespaces.
descriptions.network_overview: Network policies, services, and ingress summary.
descriptions.service_status: Status of Kubernetes services and their endpoints.
descriptions.ingress_status: Status of Ingress resources including hosts and backends.
descriptions.network_policy_status: Status of Network Policies and affected pods.
descriptions.namespace_overview: Summary of resources within a namespace.
descriptions.namespace_analysis: Detailed analysis of namespace health and resource usage.
descriptions.namespace_rbac: RBAC roles and bindings within a namespace.
descriptions.namespace_quotas: Resource quota utilization within a namespace.
descriptions.namespace_events: Events filtered to a specific namespace.
descriptions.namespace_monitor: Real-time monitoring of namespace resource trends.
descriptions.operator_subscription_status: Detailed status of Operator Lifecycle Manager subscriptions.
descriptions.crd_health: Health and status of Custom Resource Definitions.
descriptions.configmap_status: Status of ConfigMaps including size and update times.
descriptions.gitops_drift: Drift detection between Git source and live cluster state.
descriptions.helm_release_status: Status of Helm releases across clusters.
descriptions.helm_releases: List of all deployed Helm releases.
descriptions.helm_history: Revision history and rollback options for Helm releases.
descriptions.helm_values_diff: Diff of Helm values between revisions.
descriptions.kustomization_status: Status of Kustomize overlays and their resources.
descriptions.chart_versions: Available Helm chart versions and update status.
descriptions.argocd_applications: ArgoCD application inventory and sync status.
descriptions.argocd_health: Health of ArgoCD applications and components.
descriptions.gpu_overview: Summary of GPU resources across all clusters.
descriptions.gpu_status: Current GPU utilization and health status.
descriptions.gpu_inventory: Inventory of GPU nodes with model, memory, and driver info.
descriptions.gpu_utilization: Real-time GPU utilization percentage and temperature.
descriptions.gpu_usage_trend: Historical GPU usage trends over time.
descriptions.gpu_namespace_allocations: GPU allocations broken down by namespace.
descriptions.hardware_health: Detects hardware device disappearances (GPUs, NICs, NVMe, InfiniBand) that often require a power cycle to recover.
descriptions.rbac_overview: Overview of RBAC roles, bindings, and permissions.
descriptions.policy_violations: Active policy violations from OPA, Kyverno, or other engines.
descriptions.opa_policies: OPA Gatekeeper policies and constraint status.
descriptions.kyverno_policies: Kyverno policies and their enforcement status.
descriptions.trivy_scan: Container image vulnerability scan results from Trivy.
descriptions.kubescape_scan: Security posture scan results from Kubescape.
descriptions.compliance_score: Overall compliance score across security frameworks.
descriptions.cert_manager: TLS certificate status and renewal from cert-manager.
descriptions.active_alerts: Currently firing alerts from Prometheus or other sources.
descriptions.alert_rules: Configured alert rules and their evaluation status.
descriptions.kubecost_overview: Cost breakdown and optimization from Kubecost.
descriptions.gateway_status: Gateway API resource status and routing.
descriptions.upgrade_status: Kubernetes version upgrade status and available upgrades.
descriptions.user_management: Manage console users and their roles.
descriptions.github_activity: Recent GitHub activity: commits, PRs, and issues.
descriptions.kubectl: Interactive kubectl terminal for running commands.
descriptions.weather: Current weather conditions for cluster locations.
descriptions.rss_feed: RSS feed reader for Kubernetes news and blogs.
descriptions.iframe_embed: Embed an external web page inside a card.
descriptions.network_utils: Network diagnostic utilities: ping, DNS, traceroute.
descriptions.console_ai_kubeconfig_audit: AI audit of kubeconfig files for security and cleanup.
descriptions.console_ai_offline_detection: Monitors cluster health and predicts failures before they happen.
descriptions.stock_market_ticker: Live stock market ticker with tech company prices.
descriptions.prow_jobs: PROW CI/CD job status and results.
descriptions.prow_status: Overall PROW system health and queue depth.
descriptions.prow_history: Historical PROW job runs and success rates.
descriptions.llm_inference: llm-d inference endpoint status and request metrics.
descriptions.llm_models: LLM models deployed via llm-d with version info.
descriptions.llmd_flow: Animated visualization of inference request flow through the llm-d stack.
descriptions.llmd_ai_insights: AI-generated insights about llm-d performance, bottlenecks, and optimization recommendations.
descriptions.llmd_configurator: Configure llm-d deployment parameters: replicas, autoscaling, model variants, and resource limits.
descriptions.kvcache_monitor: Real-time KV cache utilization across inference pods with hit rates and memory usage.
descriptions.epp_routing: Endpoint Picker Pod routing decisions: how requests are distributed based on KV cache affinity.
descriptions.pd_disaggregation: Prefill/Decode disaggregation architecture: separate pools for prompt processing and token generation.
descriptions.ml_jobs: Machine learning training and batch job status.
descriptions.ml_notebooks: Jupyter notebook server status and resource usage.
descriptions.nightly_e2e_status: Nightly end-to-end test results and trends.
descriptions.benchmark_hero: Latest benchmark results with key metrics.
descriptions.latency_breakdown: Latency breakdown by component and percentile.
descriptions.throughput_comparison: Throughput comparison across models and hardware.
descriptions.provider_health: Health and status of AI and cloud infrastructure providers.
descriptions.sudoku_game: Classic Sudoku puzzle game with multiple difficulty levels.
descriptions.match_game: Memory matching game with Kubernetes resource icons.
descriptions.checkers: Play checkers against an AI opponent.
descriptions.game_2048: Slide and merge tiles to reach 2048.
descriptions.pod_sweeper: Minesweeper clone with a Kubernetes pod theme.
descriptions.flappy_pod: Navigate a pod through cluster obstacles.
descriptions.kube_man: Pac-Man style game collecting resources in a cluster maze.
descriptions.kube_kong: Donkey Kong inspired platformer with Kubernetes theme.
descriptions.pod_pitfall: Pitfall-style adventure game as a pod.
descriptions.node_invaders: Space Invaders clone defending your cluster.
descriptions.kube_pong: Classic Pong game with cluster theming.
descriptions.kube_craft: Build and manage your cluster world.
descriptions.console_offline_detection: Monitor offline nodes, GPU issues, and AI-predicted failures.

llmdAIInsights.selectStackToSee: Select a stack to see insights
llmdAIInsights.scalePlaceholder: e.g., How should I scale my prefill servers?
llmdAIInsights.stackDegraded: The {{name}} stack is in a degraded state. Some components may not be functioning optimally.
llmdAIInsights.stackDegradedRec: Check pod status and logs for failing components. Look for resource constraints or configuration issues.
llmdAIInsights.stackUnhealthyDesc: The {{name}} stack is unhealthy. Critical components are not running.
llmdAIInsights.stackUnhealthyRec: Immediate investigation required. Check pod events, resource quotas, and node availability.
llmdAIInsights.noGatewayDesc: This stack has no gateway component. External traffic routing may not be properly configured.
llmdAIInsights.noGatewayRec: Deploy an Istio Gateway or Envoy ingress to handle external inference requests.
llmdAIInsights.manualScalingDesc: This stack does not have an autoscaler. Replicas must be scaled manually.
llmdAIInsights.manualScalingRec: Consider enabling Variant Autoscaling (WVA) or HPA for automatic scaling based on load.
llmdAIInsights.limitedHeadroomDesc: Autoscaler is at {{current}}/{{max}} replicas. Limited capacity for traffic spikes.
llmdAIInsights.limitedHeadroomRec: Consider increasing maxReplicas to allow for traffic bursts, or optimize resource usage.
